meanings.definition: A person or thing that points.
meanings.sent1: The pointers in the museum guided us to the ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent2: I always follow the pointers my teacher gives me for solving math problems.
meanings.sent3: The pointers on the map were like friendly helpers showing us the way.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like pointers, leading me to the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The pointers on the signpost were clear and easy to follow.

meanings.definition: A helpful piece of advice or suggestion.
meanings.sent1: She gave me some great pointers on how to improve my writing.
meanings.sent2: His pointers on saving money really helped me budget better.
meanings.sent3: The pointers from the wise old owl were always worth listening to.
meanings.sent4: Her pointers were like golden nuggets of wisdom in a sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The pointers from the experienced hiker saved us from getting lost in the forest.

meanings.definition: A small, thin, sharp object used for pointing or piercing.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used a pair of pointers to highlight important information on the board.
meanings.sent2: He accidentally stepped on a sharp pointers and hurt his foot.
meanings.sent3: The tiny pointers on the compass looked like miniature swords.
meanings.sent4: The pointers of the compass were like tiny needles pointing north.
meanings.sent5: She carefully picked up the pointers to avoid getting pricked.

meanings.definition: A direction or indication of something.
meanings.sent1: The pointers of the compass showed us which way to go in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The signs on the road gave clear pointers to the nearest gas station.
meanings.sent3: The pointers in the treasure map led us to the hidden chest of gold.
meanings.sent4: His smile was a pointer to his happiness after receiving good news.
meanings.sent5: The pointers in the sky guided the lost hikers back to safety.
